concise_definition: v. 促进, 推广, 晋升

definitions.explanation_en: To actively support or encourage the growth, success, or adoption of something, such as a product, idea, or behavior, often through advertising, advocacy, or public effort.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指通过广告、倡导或公共努力积极支持或鼓励某事物（如产品、理念或行为）的发展、成功或被接受。
definitions.example_en: The company promotes its new line of eco-friendly products through social media campaigns.
definitions.example_cn: 该公司通过社交媒体活动推广其新推出的环保产品系列。

definitions.explanation_en: To advance someone to a higher position, rank, or level, especially in a professional or organizational context.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在职业或组织环境中将某人提升到更高的职位、等级或层级。
definitions.example_en: After five years of outstanding performance, she was promoted to senior manager.
definitions.example_cn: 在五年表现出色后，她被晋升为高级经理。

definitions.explanation_en: To foster or contribute to the development or occurrence of a particular condition, feeling, or outcome, often positively.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指促进或促成某种状况、情感或结果的发生，通常带有积极含义。
definitions.example_en: Regular exercise promotes better sleep and overall health.
definitions.example_cn: 规律锻炼有助于改善睡眠和整体健康。

comparison.analysis: “Encourages” (鼓励) 更侧重于给予精神支持或激励，使某人更有信心去做某事，语气较温和，常用于情感或心理层面。而 “promotes” 更具主动性，常涉及系统性、策略性的推动，如商业推广或政策倡导。
“Advances” (推进) 强调使某事物向前发展，尤其在技术、科学或进度方面，常指实质性的进展。而 “promotes” 更广泛，可包含推广、提升、助长等含义，不一定涉及具体进展，但更强调主动推动。
“Advertises” (广告宣传) 专指通过媒体或商业渠道宣传产品或服务，是 “promotes” 的一种具体手段。而 “promotes” 的范围更广，可包括非商业性的倡导、晋升或环境支持，不限于广告形式。
